column5: Been out a few times with no luck this year so far.  Well kind of no luck.  I've caught a couple of 3-4 lbs oos bass and a couple of measily perch.  Last night I skipped out of work early, it was way to nice not too.  Came accross a ship heading o my spot.  After I took the picture I thought to myself, what was that post on OFC about taking pictures of vessels on boarder waters?  Oh well.  Had a few really good hits while trolling, but didn't land anything, not sure what happened there?  Then throughing a little spinner I caught this beauty.  She put up a nice fight for sure.  It was great hearing the drag scream again.  Measured in at 30 inches.  Not sure of the weight, but it was heavy.  Not sure if it had just eaten something or is pre spawn as it was pretty plump.  I did not submit this pic for the tourney as I know I'll get a bigger one.

Way to go!  Nice first pike of the season for you.  Come on...be honest...you didn't submit it because you caught it in 2006....LOL.  Perfect day to be out there...good for you for leaving work early!
Nice fat pike Crankbaits  I have seen that ship.  This is a shot from Montreal near the Champlain Bridge.
Hey Scott,  Nice looking fish ya got there!  Good job.
Nice looking fish cranks bait.  Ps you should fix the time and year on your camara  02/13/2006 9:48pm just a heads up
nice looking pike, thanks for sharing.
That is a fat spring fish!!!

Ya that ship is a regular through here.  My favorite one is BIG LIFT,  It's a big yellow Tonka style.  I don't have any pictures of it however.  Thanks for the heads up on the date.  Didn't even know it was there.  New camera and the inept don't mix well.
good way to start the season,congrats
Don't worry, we don't have rules here saying that you can't post fish caught the year before or something   just joking.  Great clean looking fish! Thanks for sharing.
I had the same problem with my camara always said 2005 and i was taking pics for 2007. Well once again great looking fish nice and fat
I just turn the date stamp off on my camera. Because I tend to print/frame a lot of pictures I take, the date on the picture just ruins it.
